content.question: These two works portray the same Egyptian pharaoh. Identify the pharaoh. Discuss how the characteristics of these two works typify art during his reign.

frqParts.text: These two works portray the same Egyptian pharaoh. Identify the pharaoh. Discuss how the characteristics of these two works typify art during his reign.

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a work of art (or group of related works of art), providing-  a. title or designation.  b. name of artist.  c. culture of origin.  d. style.  e. date of creation.  f. materials.
